name: Phiarlan Phantasmist
text: The entertainers and artisans of House Phiarlan employ a variety of media and techniques to express their art and distract their foes. Members of the house who show a predisposition for illusion are often trained as phantasmists. As a phantasmist, you excel in evasion and deception. Your training has taught you how to bring your enemies’ nightmares to life. You can cloak yourself in shadows or trick foes with illusory forms. When you perfect your art, you even gain the power to make an illusion into a deadly reality.

features.mindFire(11thLevel): Any enemy affected by one of your charm, fear, illusion, or psychic powers takes a -2 penalty to saving throws against that power’s effect
features.phantasmistAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you or one ally within 3 squares of you becomes invisible until the start of your next turn
features.phase-mistShroud(16thLevel): Whenever you use an illusion power, you gain concealment and a +1 bonus to attacks rolls with charm, fear, illusion, or psychic powers until the end of your next turn

flavorText: I suggest that you withdraw. My last foes found that fleeing in abject terror was far more hazardous than a sensible surrender.
